channel.title: Battle Ages Beta
channel.description:
[center][img]http://battle-ages.net/community/images/Seamus/misc/logo.png[/img] [/center] Forums - http://battle-ages.net Download - https://www.dropbox.com/s/a2fxex2tdwicg6s/Battle-Ages.jar Webclient - http://battle-ages.net/play/
[U][B][CENTER]Development Team[/CENTER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/m5dnGdV.gif[/img][B][COLOR=#b22222] Nick[/COLOR][/B][B][COLOR=#b22222] [/COLOR][/B][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qG7DzAK.gif[/img] [B][COLOR=#b22222]Bagrov[/COLOR][/B]
I'd like to give you all a first welcome to the first step in reviving our server, Battle-Ages.
We will also have slight usergroup changes, I'll have the whole hierarchy of the staff and their roles in a thread. With all of that said, as you can tell, even though the forums are completed, to an extent, the server is currently in development. I got the forum up running earlier for you guys so you can sit around, chat, give feedback and suggestions, and all of that good stuff. This way we can also have a little place for all of the excited members waiting to play the server again all collaborate here.
If you have any questions, concerns, or ideas, please feel free to PM Me. We will all be working together to bring Battle-Ages back to it's former glory. If you have any suggestions for the forums or the upcoming server, you may gladly place them in the suggestions forum Donations can be done through the forums, or by clicking the "Donate" button on the navigation bar. Full permanent donator status is only $5 USD! You will get the status on the forums instantly, however to claim in-game items or status, you must make a thread in the donation section. All donation statuss will be given the instant the server is online, and players accounts will be pre-made to prevent sniping. We will ask for the player to give a username and temporary password in which they may change when logging in.
Lastly, staff will never ask for your account information or passwords. There are logs for a reason, and in last case resorts, I can copy the character file of a player. Forum-wise, accounts can be disabled and contacted through Email. With all of that said, and hopefully not missing anything, I like to wish everyone happy foruming! Again, any questions or concerns, feel free to private message me and I will respond asap
[B]Updates Log[/B][COLOR=#b22222] -Netty Networking -Implemented Bank pins [/COLOR][COLOR=#B22222]-Client music[/COLOR][COLOR=#b22222] -Fixed Godswords stances and attack animations -Deposit all/deposit box/bank interfaces added -Soulsplit healing effects -Rewrote Combat -Rewrote Crafting -Rewrote Firemaking -New client with resizable/maximizable, and fixed mode that are interchangable, -"Buy X" and "Sell X" options for shop interfaces. -All dupes fixed -Most advanced bridding -Zoom in & out feature on client -Bank pin support -Clue scrolls/Rewards -New home -Fixed skillcape emotes -Clan wars -Bounty Hunter -Slayer points and Pk points system -Items kept on death working 100% with all correct interfaces and with the tab in correct place -Enhanced combat system -Fully working duel arena with all dupes fixed. -Minigames -Cool areas for everything with some cool unique features. -Nex -Hunter + Summoning -Zoom in & out feature on the client and stuff. -Not bad combat I've done some work on it and it's a lot better than it was. -Loads of bosses all working and stuff lul -Clipped following -Clipped NPC's -Fully working fun pk with no bugs/glitches[/COLOR]
[B]Media[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/i4WisrD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/b3hHD8p.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Q9Jzd6C.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pdi5pEX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SbeupVB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IDiJn65.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e2c174e3bd557b9ab113a7907a65737b.png[/img]
Looking for another scripter! Skype: iiBanks
-Credits Raw Envy Me Bagrov Graham

item.title: Battle Ages Beta
item.dc:creator: @banxyg banxyg
item.description:
@banxyg wrote:

[center]
[/center]
Forums - http://battle-ages.net
Download - https://www.dropbox.com/s/a2fxex2tdwicg6s/Battle-Ages.jar
Webclient - http://battle-ages.net/play/

[U][B][CENTER]Development Team[/CENTER]
[B][COLOR=#b22222] Nick[/COLOR][/B][B][COLOR=#b22222]
[/COLOR][/B] [B][COLOR=#b22222]Bagrov[/COLOR][/B]

I’d like to give you all a first welcome to the first step in reviving our server, Battle-Ages.

We will also have slight usergroup changes, I’ll have the whole hierarchy of the staff and their roles in a thread. With all of that said, as you can tell, even though the forums are completed, to an extent, the server is currently in development. I got the forum up running earlier for you guys so you can sit around, chat, give feedback and suggestions, and all of that good stuff. This way we can also have a little place for all of the excited members waiting to play the server again all collaborate here.

If you have any questions, concerns, or ideas, please feel free to PM Me. We will all be working together to bring Battle-Ages back to it’s former glory. If you have any suggestions for the forums or the upcoming server, you may gladly place them in the suggestions forum
Donations can be done through the forums, or by clicking the “Donate” button on the navigation bar. Full permanent donator status is only $5 USD! You will get the status on the forums instantly, however to claim in-game items or status, you must make a thread in the donation section. All donation statuss will be given the instant the server is online, and players accounts will be pre-made to prevent sniping. We will ask for the player to give a username and temporary password in which they may change when logging in.

Lastly, staff will never ask for your account information or passwords. There are logs for a reason, and in last case resorts, I can copy the character file of a player. Forum-wise, accounts can be disabled and contacted through Email.
With all of that said, and hopefully not missing anything, I like to wish everyone happy foruming! Again, any questions or concerns, feel free to private message me and I will respond asap

[B]Updates Log[/B][COLOR=#b22222]
-Netty Networking
-Implemented Bank pins
[/COLOR][COLOR=#B22222]-Client music[/COLOR][COLOR=#b22222]
-Fixed Godswords stances and attack animations
-Deposit all/deposit box/bank interfaces added
-Soulsplit healing effects
-Rewrote Combat
-Rewrote Crafting
-Rewrote Firemaking
-New client with resizable/maximizable, and fixed mode that are interchangable,
-“Buy X” and “Sell X” options for shop interfaces.
-All dupes fixed
-Most advanced bridding
-Zoom in & out feature on client
-Bank pin support
-Clue scrolls/Rewards
-New home
-Fixed skillcape emotes
-Clan wars
-Bounty Hunter
-Slayer points and Pk points system
-Items kept on death working 100% with all correct interfaces and with the tab in correct place
-Enhanced combat system
-Fully working duel arena with all dupes fixed.
-Minigames
-Cool areas for everything with some cool unique features.
-Nex
-Hunter + Summoning
-Zoom in & out feature on the client and stuff.
-Not bad combat I’ve done some work on it and it’s a lot better than it was.
-Loads of bosses all working and stuff lul
-Clipped following
-Clipped NPC’s
-Fully working fun pk with no bugs/glitches[/COLOR]

[B]Media[/B]






Looking for another scripter!
Skype: iiBanks

-Credits
Raw Envy
Me
Bagrov
Graham
